title: Ticket #5784: Set NEGOTIATOR_CONSIDER_PREEMPTION intelligently
description: NEGOTIATOR_CONSIDER_PREEMPTION significantly improves negotiator performance, at the cost disabling preemption. The current default is false. We should change this knob from true or false to true/false/auto, where auto intelligently sets N_C_P to the right value based on PREEMPTION_REQUIREMENTS, startd RANK and pslot preemption.
creator: gthain
